title: The Hell Hermit
description: This is a spin off of the character, Devlin, from the Dunkin, the Vampire Slayer series of novels. It's a rip off of X-Files, featuring a near indestructible alcoholic vampire, with few socially redeeming qualities, a wolf, a chimp, a few other off-beat characters and the end of the world...unless Devlin can can find some liquor in the non-alcoholic Mideastern lands.
author: Greg Crites
